title: Roy Orbison &ndash; The Platinum Collection 2004 only1joe FLAC-E
description:
Roy Orbison Ã¢â‚¬â€œ The Platinum Collection 2004 only1joe FLAC-EAC

Roy Orbison's three-disc Platinum Collection from EMI contains 49 original Monument and Virgin recordings from the early '60s through the '80s. Obvious number one classics like "Only the Lonely" (1960), "Running Scared" (1961), and "Oh Pretty Woman" (1964) are represented alongside his final chart entries and posthumous hits, including the duet version of "Crying" with k.d. Lang (1987), "You Got It" (1989), and "I Drove All Night" (1992). This collection, coupled with Bear Family's Sun Years 1956-58, forms a well-rounded retrospective of Orbison's hauntingly beautiful voice and timeless material. Includes 24-page booklet with extensive liner notes & rare photos, packaged in a triple pack butterfly case - All Music Review by Al Campbell
